Specialist post test courses

These courses offer a great way to improve your driving skills and build your road confidence by teaching you more advanced driving techniques.

Pass-plus

Designed by the DSA specifically for newly passed drivers. Drivers must successfully complete 6 modules which include: town driving, driving on a dual carriageway, driving on a motorway, night driving, country driving and all weather driving.

This course will qualify for a significant discount on your insurance premiums with participating insurers.

 £180.00

Motorway driving courses

Refresher courses
